- [93mOlefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m of [93mphospholipids[0m by [93mRuthenium[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcatalysts[0m in [93msolution[0m and on [93mliposomes[0m under [93mbiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mconditions[0m.: The [93mlast[0m [93mdecade[0m [93mhas[0m [93mseen[0m a [93mlot[0m of [93minterest[0m in [93mclassical[0m [93morganometallic[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93mperformed[0m [93mintracellularly[0m, or at [93mleast[0m under [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mwater[0m). [93mOne[0m [93msuch[0m [93mclassical[0m [93mreaction[0m is [93molefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m ([93mOM[0m), which is [93mextremely[0m [93mcommon[0m in [93mpreparative[0m [93morganic[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mhowever[0m under [93mnon[0m-[93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93mesp[0m. [93morganic[0m [93msolvents[0m). The [93mintra[0m- and [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mproducts[0m of [93mDOPC[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m was [93msignificantly[0m [93mdiminished[0m in the [93mvesicles[0m, [93mhowever[0m, the [93mequilibrium[0m [93mstate[0m in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mreached[0m in [93mmuch[0m [93mless[0m [93mtime[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93msolution[0m ([93m1[0m [93mh[0m in [93mvesicles[0m [93mvs[0m. [93m24[0m [93mh[0m in [93msolution[0m). - [93mInorganic[0m [93mclick[0m [93mreactions[0m: [93mrecent[0m [93mstudies[0m on the [93mreactivity[0m of [93mmetal[0m [93mazides[0m of [93mgroups[0m [93m6[0m-[93m9[0m [93mtowards[0m [93malkynes[0m and [93mnitriles[0m.: [93mClick[0m [93mreactions[0m [93mhave[0m been [93mcomprehensively[0m [95mexplored[0m and [93memployed[0m in [93mbio[0m-[93morthogonal[0m [93mcoupling[0m [93mowing[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mremarkable[0m [93mspecificity[0m.
